sentences.en: He did his best this week to stonewall questions and to block even the most modest proposals.
sentences.cn: 他这周竭力避免作出明确答复，甚至连一些最温和的建议都企图阻拦。

sentences.en: The administration is just stonewalling in an attempt to hide their political embarrassment.
sentences.cn: 政府只是在故意拖延，企图掩盖其政治窘态。

sentences.en: The defense claims that the prosecution and the labs they employ stonewall'discovery requests.
sentences.cn: 辩方主张控方和他们雇用的实验室都妨碍了辩方的发现请求.

words.tran_cn: 妨碍；阻碍；小心翼翼地打球
妨碍；阻碍；小心翼翼地打球

trans.tran_cn: 慎重的打球, 妨碍, 阻碍
trans.tran_en: to delay a discussion, decision etc by talking a lot and refusing to answer questions

trans.tran_cn: （用冗长发言或拒绝回答问题等）拖延[阻碍]议事，设置障碍，拒绝执行命令，拒绝服从命令，（板球中）打守势球，小心地打慢球
